alert.note: Alert for Elmore (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued January 03 at 1:56PM CST until January 03 at 2:30PM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 PM CST FOR NORTHWESTERN ELMORE COUNTY... At 156 PM CST, a confirmed tornado was located over Weoka Mills, or 10 miles northwest of Wetumpka, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Damaging tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar confirmed tornado. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include... Ten Cedar Estates, Jordan Lake, Titus, Weoka Mills, Central and Holtville. TORNADO...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a tornado is on the ground. TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
